website_summaries.verdict: If you need a laundry detergent that will go above and beyond to freshen your clothes while being gentle on your skin, we highly recommend this formula from Arm & Hammer.
pros: Designed especially for people with sensitive skin
No added dyes, preservatives, or perfumes
cons: A little on the pricey side

customer_reviews.title: Good deal, great price rhymes with nice
customer_reviews.text: Clothes smell good, not like doo doo and pee pee
customer_reviews.author: capt. cackle

customer_reviews.title: It’s laundry soap
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has eczema, so everything is scent free, dye free. This works nicely, doesn’t make her break her. I do t notice a smell of any kind, and the clothes looks clean. It doesn’t however take forever to pour. I have to kind of squish is make it flow faster (from first use). But beside that it’s laundry soap and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Product is great, BUT...
customer_reviews.text: I always purchase this detergent at the store, but with COVID-19 I needed to order online. Unfortunately, the package showed up leaking with detergent and a good portion of the product was wasted. Just be careful ordering such large products w/ liquid.... the postal service does NOT handle w/ care.
customer_reviews.author: BIKINIISANDBELLINIIS

customer_reviews.title: Great detergent, bad value packaging
customer_reviews.text: So this is my favorite laundry detergent, but it's currently $15 for 210 ounces. You can buy the 150 ounce bottle for $7, so it's kind of disappointing that it doesn't save any $ to buy a larger container. Also I wasn't able to use the spout, even from the first use when I put it on my shelf in my laundry room, it leaked everywhere. I had to store it on the end and pour it out the other side anyway, so there was really no point in having the spout.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly G.

customer_reviews.title: Screw Cap was a half-turn loose
customer_reviews.text: There was no visible damage to the shipping box. Opened the box and found detergent on the inside. Checked the screw on cap and it was fairly loose. Not worth my time to return it. I'll just purchase locally next time.
customer_reviews.author: Derek T

customer_reviews.title: I especially like that there are no perfumes in this laundry detergent
customer_reviews.text: I especially like that there are no perfumes in this laundry detergent. I am allergic to many of the perfumes and dyes that other laundry detergents have so Arm & Hammer laundry detergent gets my clothes really clean without having to use so much detergent and I don't break out in hives. Thank you Arm & Hammer!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, good container
customer_reviews.text: This detergent certainly works on strong smells (I have a cat and a large dog) and dirt. The large pump container is very convenient as I do a lot of laundry, and also am a small person so I find manhandling the bottles to pour them to be difficult.
customer_reviews.author: karanna

customer_reviews.title: No Cap?
customer_reviews.text: Does not come with cap which doesn’t make any sense. You need the cap to measure how much liquid to use. Also, The liquid will drip onto whatever surface you have the detergent sitting on, without the cap.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: It’s alright but after started using it didn’t seem so sensitive my kids started breaking out and getting rashes and every time they put on clean clothes after using this they would get itchy. We switched and the problem seemed to go away.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie main

customer_reviews.title: Packing needs to improve
customer_reviews.text: Product apparently was not packed appropriately. Over half of the detergent had leaked all over the box. It is aggravating to receive the item only half full.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Leaked all over
customer_reviews.text: It leaked all over and to “exchange it” I would have to send this mess back
customer_reviews.author: Daniellerz

customer_reviews.title: Damaged goods
customer_reviews.text: The detergent container was damaged and liquid detergent spilled out when box was opened. It was too messy to return and had to be disposed of. I gave one star rating only because some rating was required. My real rating is zero.
customer_reviews.author: garrison ives

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: The cap was broken so I have to use a solo cup I cut the bottom off of to pour detergent into... but product is as it should be.
customer_reviews.author: NiftyMonkey

customer_reviews.title: Broken top and leaking
customer_reviews.text: I wish they would have taken better care of my package. The top was broken and leaking from the spout as well. I lost maybe 10 to 15 ounces of fluid.
customer_reviews.author: HazBallz

customer_reviews.title: Leaked
customer_reviews.text: Leaked inside the plastic bag it was packaged in. Not a lot, just enough to be messy. I think it may be due to a hole punched into the right hand corner of the front side.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Scruggs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have ridiculously sensitive skin and so does my children, I used to use tide sensitive skin but I get more bang for my buck with this. I dont use fragrance in my wash so the fragrance free is fine and it washes so clean. I've been using it for about 2 years now and I cant go back to anything else
customer_reviews.author: Saadia H.

customer_reviews.title: Does not work well
customer_reviews.text: Does not clean that well. Simple stains that other sensitive detergents remove remain on clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was allergic to this!
customer_reviews.text: Put on my first pair of pants from this brand and let’s just say that I was walking around in a store today when my megs started itching uncontrollably. I couldn’t even shop I had to literally run to the damn car.
customer_reviews.author: Shantell

customer_reviews.title: Great Detergent
customer_reviews.text: I have used this detergent for yrs. It works great and doesn't cost a fortune
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Allergies?
customer_reviews.text: Do you have sensitive skin? Do you have allergies to certain smells? This is your detergent! It has reduced my asthma attacks and itchy skin considerably. It cleans just as well as any other brand name detergent I’ve used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ritins

customer_reviews.title: No scent, keeps clothes clean
customer_reviews.text: Originally bought this when I had my daughter to keep her sensitive skin safe. Switched to a different one and I didn’t like it as much so I’ve switched back. No scent, which is what I wanted. And love the poor spout compared to other containers I’ve had. The lid/cup was cracked. I’m guessing from shipping but I have a washer with a container for detergent so I just use that now.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Don't know why but I'm an Arm & Hammer lifer...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely NO scent and that's exactly what I want / like. Cloths come out spotless. Man I was Arm & Hammer would make unscented dryer sheets!!!
customer_reviews.author: DCI

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I like this detergent quite a bit. I’ve never used it prior to his purchase, but I think it smells nice, I like how gentle it is, and the quantity for the price is decent. I will be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Carlisle

customer_reviews.title: gentle!, but cleans so well
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses this detergent for her husband's work clothes because it cleans so well, and also uses it for my infant grandsons clothes, because it is so gental!
customer_reviews.author: donna yates

customer_reviews.title: A mistake worthy of repeating
customer_reviews.text: I did not realize I had an allergy to detergents till I ordered this by mistake. Needless to say we will buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Rejuvenations Redesign & Staging

customer_reviews.title: Good Detergent
customer_reviews.text: Really good detergent. You get a lot for the price and works really good with my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Virgil

customer_reviews.title: Another Amazon Pantry Score!
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME! I did a lot of price comparison & ultimately this A&H size was on top. Unless I could find a bunch of individual bottles on clearance somewhere, but during these times, it’s great to find a huge size that can be delivered, even subscribed. This is the only detergent that needs all my family needs. Thanks Amazon Pantry!
customer_reviews.author: MsSushiQ1

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Was hesitating as this is the first unscented laundry detergent I have ever purchased. I find using a little more per load than it states truly helps to rid clothes of odors but otherwise great price and value
customer_reviews.author: Charles lee

customer_reviews.title: Worked well, need more.
customer_reviews.text: We have sensitive skin, great product, low odor, we need more.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick

customer_reviews.title: Needs better lid...
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy big bottles of detergent, but it's been a while since using this one. I have to say they need to improve the lid... My kids dropped it on the floor and the lid popped right off spilling all over the place...
customer_reviews.author: Jodi B

customer_reviews.title: Good price but buyer beware.
customer_reviews.text: The first time I bought this it came with a cracked lid. No big deal. This second time I ordered it, LAUNDRY DETERGENT WAS LEAKED EVERYWHERE! Ruined the soap that was in the package with it and there’s no laundry detergent!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis King

customer_reviews.title: Love the fact of heavy wash loads coming out clean!!’
customer_reviews.text: Great product and great price! Love the fact it has no smell - cleans great! Also a good price! Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Sheppard

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful buy!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for new babes! Hate spending a ton of money on “baby soap” when this works perfect for a fraction of the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Clorissa Legg

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: With a household with sensitive skin this soap works! There is no harsh scent. Laundry comes out fresh and clean! I highly recommend this soap.
customer_reviews.author: JE

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin, but I need some scent!
customer_reviews.text: I do not like unscented. I had bought for my husband because of his sensitive skin. I ended up buying the lightly scented for sensitive skin by the same company and was very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Miamigal

customer_reviews.title: NOT really "free & clear" !!!
customer_reviews.text: It contains optical brighteners, which are known cause skin CANCER! and are actually for years banned from all sensitive laundry detergents in Europe
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kunde

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: First time ever using something else than GAIN detergent. Couldn’t see any difference in washing abilities, DOESN’t have any smell which I love! Price point good too, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kombucha

customer_reviews.title: This detergent was delivered!
customer_reviews.text: For some reason it says undelivered here but I have washed 3 loads since it had been delivered satisfactory and same top quality as before!
customer_reviews.author: Bob Bruggman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal!!
customer_reviews.text: Lol awesome deal my son cant take to much other soap😵 so i got the best deal from my Amazon ha ha fast shipping thanks Amazon😇😍🚗
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: Does not clean odor!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this product but even after washing my husband's shirts twice, there was still a noticeable odor. I have used the powder version of this product for years and it has always worked well. This product was extremely disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: LunaSol

customer_reviews.title: Good detergent
customer_reviews.text: The laundry detergent does do a good job of getting the clothes clean but it is not the best
customer_reviews.author: fasteddy

customer_reviews.title: will give u a rash!
customer_reviews.text: this product irradiated my and my family's skin! or is not great for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.author: B&V82

customer_reviews.title: Its soap! Yay
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. No strong smell at all. It's clear. Its sooo much cheaper than what It cost me to buy a smaller one in my town.
customer_reviews.author: Zforzombie

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well
customer_reviews.text: Good price for the amount. Works well and is gentle enough for my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: caleb13

customer_reviews.title: Good for cleaning clothes... and cars
customer_reviews.text: It’s unscented, undyed laundry soap what more is there to say.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Saves time.
customer_reviews.text: Good deal and fast shipping. Saves time vs going to the store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Allergy sensitive: scent and dye free.
customer_reviews.text: Unscented and free of dye, as described, and it gets my laundry clean, free of odors and free of perfumes, which tend to trigger migraines for my spouse. Pour spout’s a bit slow, even with cap vented; that and over packaging are my only griefs; please put the detergent into pods and the pods into recyclable, sustainable organic packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry E. Hobson

customer_reviews.title: Works well for sensitive skin !
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and I’m sensitive to smells and I really like this product! Great value for the product you receive.
customer_reviews.author: NikkiAlexis

customer_reviews.title: Good product, bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: item got damaged during shipping, and was little leaky (<5% of total)
customer_reviews.author: Saravanan Arumugam

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: All of my laundry needs are met with this product
customer_reviews.author: Elsie31

customer_reviews.title: Love this detergent!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this detergent so much. No smell which I love.
customer_reviews.author: BlissKS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The BEST cleaning detergent out there. It lasts and lasts and makes my wash super clean.
customer_reviews.author: chihuahua

customer_reviews.title: Always a good deal!
customer_reviews.text: They had the best price so I went with it
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Good detergent, but the cap is always damaged
customer_reviews.text: The detergent is great, but Amazon has delivered it to us TWICE with a broken cap. Amazon is somehow unable to deliver large detergent containers without damaging it.
customer_reviews.author: R Z

customer_reviews.title: would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: the bottle is leaky bad and I’ll be buying something else
customer_reviews.author: leslie h

customer_reviews.title: It cleans my stuff
customer_reviews.text: I like it real good in that it cleans my clothes but it does not taste as good as the tide pods do
customer_reviews.author: joe s

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't recommend buying liquids through mail!
customer_reviews.text: Container leaked all through the whole package ruin the whole order I wouldn't recommend buying liquids through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: john ellis

customer_reviews.title: File a Claim
customer_reviews.text: Hello, I am reaching out regarding this item which was shipped along with other items, has been stolen from my front porch. I have a Nest cam and have footage as proof - I was hoping I could file a claim with you to ship out a replacement? Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: sophia p.

customer_reviews.title: NEW PRODUCT !!
customer_reviews.text: Have not use the product as yet. Evaluated it by placing some on my skin it smells okay. and it did not burn, or itch
customer_reviews.author: Maxine Graves

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have always used this laundry detergent came very fast and definitely recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Barbie

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: My grandma says this will last her for the rest of the year lol.
customer_reviews.author: Wanderlustin

customer_reviews.title: Came busted and leak on every thing in the box
customer_reviews.text: This came busted open and leak all over everything in the box
customer_reviews.author: Reneemako

customer_reviews.title: No issues with soap or delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Clothes are clean. Item is what I expected. Delivery was on time.
customer_reviews.author: Roxann schmitt

customer_reviews.title: Did not survive shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Product is good. But our box arrived smashed and half the gallon of laundry detergent had leaked out due to the cap breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I have Sensitive Skin And This Laundry Detergent Is Perfect. Doesn’t Even Really Have A Scent.
customer_reviews.author: Loran Hudson

customer_reviews.title: No more trips to Walmart for laundry soap
customer_reviews.text: big jug, good price, saved me from having to go out
customer_reviews.author: Eric Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Apparently, I was allergic to it. I broke out in a rash on my arms and legs.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Product busted open.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. BUT it came busted. I didn't realize til after I used the little pump and got detergent everywhere. It looks the the seal is busted.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Good Detergent
customer_reviews.text: Does a fine job on whites and color. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Paul K

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Lids were sealed with tapes, but still arrived broken somehow.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie J.

customer_reviews.title: Good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Previously had problems with the delivery from the shipping carrier which was solved. The product is good for sensitive skin and allergies.
customer_reviews.author: Lola A

customer_reviews.title: I like how it cleans my clothes
customer_reviews.text: I like how it cleans my clothes. The only thing I did not like was the measuring cap is sticky from the tape. I will purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey P.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Scent & Dye free products are the best products on the market for your health.
customer_reviews.author: Alberta Grigat

customer_reviews.title: Leaking all over the box
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived damaged, detergent had leaked all over the box. Others seem to have had this problem too.
customer_reviews.author: Sukrit Silas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I liked it was just what i expected. I use it for my kids clothes an mine.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica W.

customer_reviews.title: cap not screwed on
customer_reviews.text: Item leaked during shipping b/c the cap wasn't screwed on tight.
customer_reviews.author: Jinx

customer_reviews.title: Having used this product.....
customer_reviews.text: I found it to be as I knew it to be, worthy or repeated use. Thank you for asking.
customer_reviews.author: Rosanna

customer_reviews.title: Leaked all over
customer_reviews.text: Shipped upside down with the top unscrewed. Detergent got on my other products
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L Agosta

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love this detergent. Very good for sensitive skin and really cleans clothes!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... leaks when you set it on the bottom for easy access to laundry dispenser
customer_reviews.text: This container leaks when you set it on the bottom for easy access to laundry dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: Lori S.

customer_reviews.title: Good value, but cup breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: We are value shoppers who also happen to prefer laundry detergents without a bunch of unnecessary ingredients, so this product satisfies on all major counts. Our only beef (so far) is that it comes supplied with a fragile (about half the thickness of regular containers) plastic cup that was already cracked -- and therefore unusable -- when the package arrived. Had to scavenge a cup from another product. Nobody's fault, just something to be aware of.
customer_reviews.author: LibraSun

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for Bulk Buyers
customer_reviews.text: I love Arm&Hammer detergent. I've used it for 15 years starting with the powder detergent and moving on to the liquid detergent. We swapped to sensitive because of various allergies and itchy feeling. It was even gentle enough to use when our kids we're newborns. We used it for all 3 children when they were babies. Still my go to detergent for our household of 5! I can't find the big container in stores anymore so I was especially glad it was here.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Great product, hard to ship
customer_reviews.text: I know this product is a fabulous buy as we use it all the time. If you have issues with skin sensitivity or allergies then this is the product for you. We've used it successfully since it came out about 15 years or so. Shipping the product may be a different subject. If you live out in no man's land like I do, then think hard before you order. If you've had problems with packages being crushed then think twice. Just an honest review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ruins Non color safe items
customer_reviews.text: This laundry soap is not safe on non color safe items. I have not opened this up. Used the smaller container. When I used on my colored towels ( I bought from Macy’s ) the towels came out blotchy. Some of the dye had been striped from the towels. This laundry soap can only be used safely on whites. I will not use this product again. I have never had a problem before with All. But I never used this item. I do not recommend this soap.
customer_reviews.author: cathy k

customer_reviews.title: Non-Scented
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to COVID-19, shopping for nearly everything is a task. However, Amazon has been my lifesaver. Liquid Arm & Hammer Laundry Detergent has been my brand for years. Since the regularly scented type wasn't available, I selected this one. Now, I'm hooked on it for sensitive skin. No scent and not as harsh. It's a regular reorder for me and with Prime, there's no extra expense for shipping to my door!
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Bottle is more wobbly than Jenga in an earthquake.
customer_reviews.text: Product worked fine. My issue is with the packaging design. The whole thing fell off the shelf repeatedly. We always place the detergent in the same place on a shelf above the washing machine. Has not happened with any other brand, but this bottle just loves to nosedive into the washer unprovoked. It has done so three times (once was in the middle of the night, which was fun) and spills more each time. Will not buy again just based on the fact that I paid $20 for a bottle of detergent I got to use for maybe ten loads of laundry.
customer_reviews.author: L Aigner

customer_reviews.title: Say yes to no dyes.
customer_reviews.text: My family like the scented detergent but I do prefer non scented and try to always have some in the house. I really like that it is free of dyes and perfumes. In my opinion, clothing doesn’t have to smell like chemicals in order to be clean. I have been using this brand for a while now. Not only gets the job done but it is the best bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: Xiomel

customer_reviews.title: Great unscented laundry detergent
customer_reviews.text: Very effective laundry detergent. I always soak my laundry before washing it and this detergent really gets most stains out. The baking soda is very effective in removing stains and sweat/oil in general. It’s unscented which I really like as well. The value for this size is also very good. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna W

customer_reviews.title: Zero Sent and cleans
customer_reviews.text: I've used Arm & Hammer Laundry Detergent on dirty smelly laundry. I spent 5 months traveling throughout the US getting under filthy desks all day to replace PC's and printers. I'd come home every week with gross smelling dirty cloths and this product did its job. I will continue to purchase this.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Baus

customer_reviews.title: great for people with sensative skin
customer_reviews.text: it was 8 dollars cheaper than from anyplace local and delivered to the door!!!!!!! cant be beat no stars cause no scent just what we needed....thanks...will be buying again for this price and brand
customer_reviews.author: tom & joann  NEWMAN

customer_reviews.title: Price was great
customer_reviews.text: It works great and does not irritate my skin. It sits on top of washer and you just push the button and fill the washer soap bin.
customer_reviews.author: Groverjohn

customer_reviews.title: Great for those with sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This works great for me and my sensitive skin. This is the only brand and type of laundry detergent I have been using. The is a nice scent but not strong. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: DeeL

customer_reviews.title: Great detergent!
customer_reviews.text: This detergent works great and the clothes come out smelling very fresh and clean! I wash my kids clothes in these since one has sensitive skin and so far it’s really helped.
customer_reviews.author: M.J.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Cleans our clothes and gets stains out. I normally buy the original version but it was out at the time so got this. Theres no real scent or anything so it's perfect for thoses sensitive to smells or for their skin for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Maddy K

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only laundry detergent I can use that doesn't make me break out in hives. Love it. PLUS it cleans good.
customer_reviews.author: JanetElla

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for me due to sensitive skin. Pour this into smaller bottle when needed since this container is very big. So far, looks like one container will last us for several months with laundry for three people.
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: My favorite detergent
customer_reviews.text: I have used this detergent for a long time because of the scent-free, dye-free formula. It is really good at removing odor from clothes too. Easy on skin no itching because of dye.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor container and performance
customer_reviews.text: The container is very flimsy, after having it on a shelve for a couple weeks if warped and fell over spilling all over the laundry room. Some clothes still have odor after washing.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market for making smells go away !
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son''s work clothes (construction worker, heavy duty sweat work) and he and I are both pleased .... this works better than any detergent I've tried. Definitely gonna keep a good stock of this product !
customer_reviews.author: JudiAnne

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: I have started only buying from Amazon for this product. It lasts quite a while and is perfect for my daughter and my allergies. No harsh scents. I'm really happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Arm & Hammer Sensitive Skin Free & Clear, 140 Loads Liquid Laundry Detergent, 210 Fl oz
product_meta.description: The proven power of ARM & HAMMER Baking Soda is better than ever. Special, lower-sudsing formula rinses cleaner and is designed to work in both standard machines and today’s energy conscious High Efficiency (HE) models. Gentle on Skin. Powers out dirt and odors. Special agents in the detergent trap the soil in the wash water, so it rinses away and doesn't redeposit on your clothes. Perfume & Dye Free.
feature_bullets: Laundry detergent specially formulated for sensitive skin
Clean rinse with low-suds formula, works in standard and High Efficiency (HE) models

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
